case_title: OMEGA SPORTS AND RADIO WORKS vs COMMISSIONER OF INCOME-TAX
case_number: I. T. R. No. 54 of 1972, Income-tax Reference No. 119 of 1976
judges: C. S. P. Singh, R. R. Rastogi

facts.assessee: Messrs. Omega Sports and Radio Works, Gorakhpur
facts.change_in_constitution: Two partners retired on August 19, 1968; surviving partners formed a new partnership with another individual on August 20, 1968
facts.returns_filed: Two returns filed for two periods
facts.initial_assessment: Single assessment made for the entire year
facts.application_under_section_154: Filed to request separate assessments for two periods
facts.A_A_C_decision: Directed separate assessments for two periods
facts.Appellate_Tribunal_decision: Held section 154 could not be invoked due to debatable nature of the issue

precedents.binding_decision: Dahi Laxmi Dal Factory v. I. T. O. (1976) 103 ITR 517
precedents.contrary_decision: Addl. C. I. T. v. Visakha Flour Mills (1977) 108 ITR 166 (Andhra Pradesh High Court)
precedents.other_reference: C. I. T. v. Vindeshwari Trading Corporation (1978) 113 ITR 791
